name: Fearow
flavorText:
With its huge and
magnificent wings,
it can keep aloft without ever
having to land
for rest.

previous.name: Spearow
previous.flavorText:
It flaps its small wings busily to
fly. Using its beak, it searches
in grass for prey.

next.name: Ekans
next.flavorText:
Moves silently
and stealthily.
Eats the eggs of birds, such as
PIDGEY and
SPEAROW, whole.

pokemon.name: Spearow

It flaps its small wings busily to
fly. Using its beak, it searches
in grass for prey.
